text.#text:
Not later than 30 days after the
			 end of each fiscal year, the

header.#text:
Estimation of
			 annual illegal border crossings

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall proportionately reduce the amount of financial assistance provided
			 to the Government of Mexico for each fiscal year by a total of $1,000 for each
			 illegal border crossing from Mexico to the United States during the previous
			 fiscal year.

may decide not to reduce the amounts

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To reduce the amount of financial assistance provided to
		  the Government of Mexico in response to the illegal border crossings from
		  Mexico into the United States, which serve to dissipate the political
		  discontent with the higher unemployment rate within Mexico.
